Articles.Content:
I don't think I can insert videos into threads, so I'll just give the link.

You can check out the video here -
Nice, but to be honest the choice of music is what it sells it.

Hey, that's lovely! Ok, so it's views we see every flight. But presented this way, we're reminded of the beauty.

"Sounds like a bank commercial."

bank commercial script:

It starts with a dream. A dream, an idea, a vision. Your vision. A vision that takes root, grows, and then flies.

To see it take flight, you'll need the backing of a financial institution with vision like yours. One that dreams, like you. One that is willing to back an idea, no matter how crazy.

We are that crazy. We are Kerbal Savings & Loan. Proud sponsors of the Kerbal Space Program.

[insert dopey bank logo, fade to white]

And now, back to your regularly scheduled program.

OP: That video is very nice. I wish weather was implemented so that you could time-lapse that too.

Hey, that's lovely! Ok, so it's views we see every flight. But presented this way, we're reminded of the beauty.

bank commercial script:

It starts with a dream. A dream, an idea, a vision. Your vision. A vision that takes root, grows, and then flies.

To see it take flight, you'll need the backing of a financial institution with vision like yours. One that dreams, like you. One that is willing to back an idea, no matter how crazy.

We are that crazy. We are Kerbal Savings & Loan. Proud sponsors of the Kerbal Space Program.

[insert dopey bank logo, fade to white]

And now, back to your regularly scheduled program.

I wonder how long it took them to go out of business after they started funding KSP.

OP: That video is very nice. I wish weather was implemented so that you could time-lapse that too.

I wonder how long it took them to go out of business after they started funding KSP.

Instantly, but luckily the form of currency on kerbin consists entirely of SRB fumes.
